title: Lobby freezes at zero count, and i get ban
body:
Already more than ten times per week, there are heppening at the time of the choice of the champion. And the queue does not even have time to reach me. I can communicate with players, and they answer me, but the lobby is freeze.
These problems were still on the beta of this broken client, but I just updated to the old one. Now this is not possible and I have a ban of up to 30 minutes in the ranked.

[](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sfy-EtxO0sE)

[](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sfy-EtxO0sE)

replies.body:
Thx. With internet connection, it's usually okay, at the moment of freezes I checked the browser, and the pages were uploaded.
I had the test and it gave me such a result:

[(http://n1.netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/summary/id=369839a0-19815-f47f4f68-4ee0-47ce-b6f4#udp_connectivity)]

•We detected a possibly vulnerable UPnP device in your network 
•We received unexpected and possibly dangerous results when looking up important names 
•Fragmented UDP traffic is blocked 
•The DNS resolver may have problems with DNSSEC

Im not understand, what does it mean, but i hope riot will change this problem. If one package is missing, this is not an excuse for the entire lobby to freeze. Old client havnt this problem.

From the looks of that video, it looks like your network is getting disconnected from our servers since smashing that find match button wouldn't work, and mostly since you were dropped out of the lobby from a disconnect. The best first step towards fixing this kind of issue is to narrow down what's going wrong, which you can do by running through the steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).
